targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_temperature{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",temperature_type="current"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_smartctl_exit_status{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_smart_status{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_power_on_seconds{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_power_cycle_count{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_percentage_used{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

(sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_nvme_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))) or (sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number",protocol="NVMe"})))

panels.description: Contains the number of Error Information log entries over the life of the controller

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_num_err_log_entries{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.title: Number of error log entries

panels.description: Contains the number of occurrences where the controller detected an unrecovered data integrity error. Errors such as uncorrectable ECC, CRC checksum failure, or LBA tag mismatch are included in this field

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_media_errors{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.title: Number of media errors

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_error_log_count{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",error_log_type="summary"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_critical_warning{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.title: Critical warnings for state of controller

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_interface_speed{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",speed_type="current"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_interface_speed{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",speed_type="max"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_capacity_bytes{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_capacity_blocks{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_bytes_written{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_bytes_read{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_block_size{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",blocks_type="logical"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_block_size{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",blocks_type="physical"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.description: When the Available Spare falls below the threshold indicated in this field, an asynchronous event completion may occur. The value is indicated as a normalized percentage (0 to 100%)

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_available_spare_threshold{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.title: Available spare threshold

panels.description: Normalized percentage (0 to 100%) of the remaining spare capacity available

targets.expr: sum by(model_name, device, instance) ((smartctl_device_available_spare{instance=~"$instance",job="$job"}) * on(device, instance) group_left(model_name) (smartctl_device{instance=~"$instance",job="$job",serial_number=~"$serial_number"}))

panels.title: Available spare
